branchCategory.name: ITVX
branchCategory.description: <p>Series ITVX2000 high pressure electro-pneumatic regulator provides stepless control of air pressure to an electrical signal.  They have an easy to read digital pressure display and a power consumption of 3 W or less. The new series has a 5.0 MPa maximum supply pressure.</p>

branchItem.name: ITVX2000, High Pressure Electro-Pneumatic Regulator
branchItem.description: <P>Series ITVX2000 high pressure electro-pneumatic regulator provides stepless control of air pressure to an electrical signal. They have an easy to read digital pressure display and a power consumption of 3 W or less. The new series has a 5.0 MPa maximum supply pressure.</P>
branchItem.bullets: <LI>Stepless control of air pressure proportional to an electrical signal <LI>Maximum supply pressure: 5.0 MPa <LI>Set pressure range: 0.01 to 3.0 MPa <LI>Maximum flow rate: 3000 L/min[ANR] <LI>Fluid: Air, N<SUB>2</SUB>, O<SUB>2</SUB>, Ar <LI>Wetted parts: Fluorine grease </LI>
